title: United Natural Foods stock tanks after fiscal Q4 earnings disappoint
text: Shares of United Natural Foods Inc. UNFI, -3.91% tanked in the extended session Tuesday after the food wholesaling company reported fiscal fourth-quarter adjusted earnings that fell short of Wall Street expectations. United Natural said it earned $19 million, or 36 cents a share, in the quarter, compared with $33 million, or 64 cents a share, in the year-ago quarter. Adjusted for one-time items, the company earned 44 cents a share, compared with 76 cents a share a year ago. Sales rose to $6.41 billion from $2.6 billion a year ago. Analysts polled by FactSet had expected adjusted earnings of 47 cents a share on sales of $6.41 billion. The company guided for EPS between $1.22 and $1.76 for the year, and full-year sales between $23.5 billion and $24.3 billion. The analysts surveyed by FactSet expect full-year EPS of $1.32 on sales of $24.4 billion. United Natural Food shares ended the regular trading day down 3.9%.
